title: Episode 14: Brian Koppelman
itunes:title: Episode 14: Brian Koppelman
description: Brian Koppelman joins Sasha for this week’s episode. Brian is the co-creator and show running of the hit TV show Billions and co-writer of other well-known movies like Oceans 13 and Rounders. Sasha and Brian talk about how he defines success and how that’s changed over the many phases of his career in entertainment.
author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
itunes:author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
